text:
[Verse]
Sunshine on my window
Kids play in the street
Laughing with my friends
Simple life feels sweet

[Verse 2]
Chillin' at the corner
Lemonade so cold
Summer breeze is blowing
Stories that we told

[Chorus]
Lemonade days
Golden and bright
Lemonade ways
Feels just right

[Verse 3]
Music from the speakers
Dancing all around
Feet tapping rhythm
Lost and found

[Bridge]
So we live for moments
Captured in a smile
Life's simple treasures
Make it all worthwhile

[Verse 4]
Stars start to twinkle
Sky turns dark and blue
Memories like fireflies
Glow inside of you
title: Lemonade Days
